queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

Select DISTINCT concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mto.STORE,'#0#',mto.STORE) STORE, concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mto.DESTINATION,'#0#',mto.DESTINATION) DEST, concat('MRN_SPE01#SLTRAN&arg1=',mto.TRANSFER) ILIAS, mto.TRANSFER Trf, mto.TYPE, -- concat('MRN_SPE09#03#DSTAT#',mto.TYPE,'#1#',mto.TYPE), mto.REQNO, mto.PURNO, concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',mto.NSN,'#0#',mto.NSN) '______NSN_____', mn.DESCRIPTION, mn.LAST_PRICE, mto.Qty, mto.QTY_RECEIVED, mto.QTY_PLACED, mto.QTY_LOST, date(mto.startdate) STARTDATE, date(mto.Transdate) TRANSDATE, datediff(NOW(),mto.transdate) 'DAYS_OPEN', concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mto.VIA_STORE,'#0#',mto.VIA_STORE) VIA_STORE, mto.TNINO, substr(mto.sscc,9,16) SSCC, md.DISCREPANCY, mat.ASSET from mrqr_transactions_open mto inner join mrqr_nsn mn on mto.nsn=mn.nsn left join mrqr_discrepancies md on mto.tnino=md.tnino left join mrqr_assets_trf mat on mto.transfer=mat.transaction where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pDESTINATION','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and IF('pDESTINATION'='',true, mto.destination = 'pDESTINATION') and IF('pSSCC'='',true, mto.sscc like 'pSSCC') and IF('pNSN'='',true, mto.nsn like 'pNSN') and IF('pSTORE'='',true, mto.store like 'pSTORE') and mto.type in ('I','F','A','U') and IF('pSSCC'='',true, mto.sscc like 'pSSCC') and IF('pTRANSFER'='',true, mto.transfer like 'pTRANSFER') and IF('pDAYSOPEN'='',true, datediff(NOW(),mto.transdate) >'pDAYSOPEN')
